page.title: 13HULL K.R. RUGBY STAR
page.content: AN INTERVIEW WITH {ROY HOLDSTOCK} OF HULL KINGSTON ROVERS. {How many games do you play a season? About 46. {What do you enjoy about a rugby match? The fact that for 80 minutes you knock hell out of each other but afterwards everyones friends and bears no malice. {What do you think of all the recent {crowd violence at football matches? It disgusts me to see lads kicking the hell out of each other for no apparent reason than to brag about it to a friend. If they want to let off steam why dont they visit a local gym or join a football or rugby team. I think that if my two boys were involved I am almost certain I would be able to spot it and take steps to avoid it. Who's to blame? Parents? Who knows?
